content: into fpdc3-decrease fpdc-increase fpdc fpdc-increase round #38 repeat 24 times dc2-decrease in the back loop 10 double_crochet in the back loop dc2-decrease in the back loop fpdc-increase 3 fpdc fpdc-increase round #39 repeat 24 times double_crochet-increase in the back loop 10 double_crochet in the back loop double_crochet-increase in the back loop fpdc2-decrease 3 fpdc fpdc2-decrease round #40 repeat 24 times 14 double_crochet in the back loop fpdc2-decrease fpdc fpdc2-decrease magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com round #41 repeat 24 times double_crochet-increase in the back loop 13 double_crochet in the back loop fpdc3-decrease round #42 make double_crochet in the back loop all around there will be 24*16 double_crochet altogether round #43 make half_double_crochet in the back loop for the first half of the round and then single_crochet in the back loop for the remaining half to lower the height of the stitch round #44 make slip_stitch in the back loop for the entire round round #45 i had some string left and i didn t want to cut it so i made one more round of slip stitches through both loops all around you don t have to do that if you think it s boring the end if you make the leafy carpet please send me its photo with some details about yourself like your name and where you re from i m curious to know how far my designs travel www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com check out my other carpets http //magiccarpetstudio blogspot com/p/portfolio html magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com
